## Example 3

```{r}
library(ideogRam)
```

Test native url input for annotationsPath: e.g. 
https://unpkg.com/ideogram@0.9.0/dist/data/annotations/10_virtual_cnvs.json

See https://github.com/eweitz/ideogram/issues/78

```{r}
ideo_03_config <- list(
    organism = "human",
    annotationsPath = "https://unpkg.com/ideogram@0.9.0/dist/data/annotations/10_virtual_cnvs.json",
    annotationsLayout = "overlay"
)

p <- ideogRam(data = ideo_03_config)
p
```
